info.name: SitecoreCommerce_DevOps
info.description: Example calls for direct http requests to support DevOps functionlity

request.description:
This call will set up an initial install by adding any necessary artifacts to the Global Environment and creating any other logical environments.
This can be run at any time and will rewrite environments to their original states from the environment data stored here:
~\wwwroot\data\Environments
Completely removes all artifacts from the passed-in Environment.
Runs an InitializeEnvironment Pipeline which allows any artifacts to be created that need to be in a new environment.

item.name: Check Long Running Command Status for Minions

request.description: Runs an InitializeEnvironment Pipeline which allows any artifacts to be created that need to be in a new environment.

item.name: Health Check
item.description: Perform a health check request to the engine
